entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
